content: Unsurprisingly the two Marks are spot on here. I worrh though that people are constantly inundated with the jargon — Machine Learning/Deep Learning/AI and misunderstand the differences and similarities. The real danger though is that people get jaded with the terms and assume this is another “Big Data” — terminology that everyone uses because it’s en vogue without understanding what this means. The real point behind Mark C’s view is that machine learning isn’t just another trend — it’s an absolutely fundamental shift in how computing will revolutionise our lives and industry. It is as big a paradigm shift as mobile was and is the ultimate game-changer. So it’s not just about learning about machine learning — it’s about understanding that huge axis-tilt in computing and how that impacts us all. Thanks for sharing this with us Mark Suster — absolutely fascinating!
